column4: I have a fresh 8.10 server install. I created an account during the install, but every time I try to log in it says Login incorrect. What am I doing wrong?
Nope
I've reinstalled 3 time, each time, same problem.
Console, through VMWare.
The user I created during the install process.
I've done that, then tried a passwd to change the users password, but still no go.
Minimal install on the guided partion.
Let me check those.
8.10 server?  that's what you put
uhmm that will run out of support at the end of April
8.04 is LTS  not 8.10
10.04 is next LTS.   ,but your doing server OS in virtual machines?
what's your actsaul host OS?
and why are you doing Ubuntu in a server machine?   ESX4 uhmm that sounds like the virtual machine software, not the actsaul operating system it's running on
why are you doing server in a virtual machine, above?
8.04 server that makes sense,  8.10  not really when it's on the verge of running out of support.
#vmware for vmware product help
#ubuntu-server for server edition help
have you tried 8.04?
that's the one you should be trying now, 8.10 will run out of support in April
or  maybe May
